code: export async function breachChecker(password){const encoder=new TextEncoder();const data=encoder.encode(password);const buffer=await window.crypto.subtle.digest('SHA-1',data);const hash=Array.from(new Uint8Array(buffer)).map(b=>b.toString(16).padStart(2,'0')).join('').toUpperCase();const prefix=hash.substring(0,5);const suffix=hash.substring(5);let response=await fetch("https://api.pwnedpasswords.com/range/".concat(prefix));let text=await response.text();return text.includes(suffix);}
